defaultView.title: Uber Trips
defaultView.text: Get information about the places you have visited the most or from which you originate the most.

defaultView.title: Uber overview
defaultView.text: Compare the prices of your Uber rides according to several factors ( Your data is grouped by currency).

defaultView.title: Dated observations
defaultView.text: See all the dated events in your files, corresponding to data that has been collected on you at or concerning a specific date.
